comment: I took beginning pilates with Walker and it was a great class. We did a diet journal and focused on health as well as fitness. This class really inspired me to eat clean and workout more. Walker is a great coach and cares about her students.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: simple class. she's awesome. 8am yoga wasn't too bad. she's funny and works well with students. only thing I would change about the class is that she should have incorporated music into the lessons.

This was the best class. Mrs. Walker was so amazing and she made the class extremely enjoyable. She taught us more than just pilates, we learned about health, healthy eating, and such. Only grades were a skills test, diet journal, and final. She is amazing, and I take Hot Yoga classes with her bc I love her so much. This will be your favorite class

Mrs. Walker is the best Pilates teacher ever! Very clear, easy to understand instructions and she's not afraid to open up with her students and really form relationships. My class was all female and there were several classes where we just sat and talked through any negative energy we had going on. AMAZING class & I would LOVE to take it again.

Amazing instructor. I took her for Yoga and I really enjoyed it. She makes it incredibly easy to understand and it ended being one of my favorite classes of the semester. She's very easy going. Make sure to go to every class though. The only project we had the whole semester was a diet journal which was easy enough. Highly recommended!

I took her for Beginning Yoga and I LOVED it. She is so helpful and really wants to see you succeed in her class. Very easy. Really only one midterm, 1 project, and final. Just make sure to show up. Definitely would take this class again in a heartbeat!

Amazing professor! Took her beginning yoga class and really enjoyed it. I honestly did not even feel as if I was on campus. She made class so much fun and is also extremely laid-back. I'm definitely hoping to take more of her yoga classes outside of campus after this semester.
Took her for beginning yoga. Super easy class. 1 skills test for mid term and written final.
Wonderful pilates instructor! She's a very easy going person and loves to engage with her students. There's  diet journal she grades, a skills test, and a final. Overalll excellent experience!
